org.dict.zip

クラス DictZipOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • org.dict.zip.DictZipOutputStream
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable

    public class DictZipOutputStream
extends java.io.FilterOutputStream
    Test of DictZipOutputStream.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • DictZipOutputStream

        public DictZipOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                   long size)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor.
        パラメータ:
        out - output stream to filter.
        size - total data of test file.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O error occored.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid.

      • DictZipOutputStream

        public DictZipOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                   int buflen,
                   long size)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor.
        パラメータ:
        out - output stream to filter.
        buflen - size of buffer to write.
        size - total data of test file.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O error occored.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid.

      • DictZipOutputStream

        public DictZipOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                   int level,
                   int buflen,
                   long size)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor.
        パラメータ:
        out - output stream to filter.
        level - level of compression, 9=best, 1=fast.
        buflen - size of buffer to write.
        size - total data of test file.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O error occored.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid.

      • DictZipOutputStream

        public DictZipOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream out,
                   java.util.zip.Deflater defl,
                   int buflen,
                   long size)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructor.
        パラメータ:
        out - output stream to filter.
        defl - custom deflater class, should be child of Deflater class.
        buflen - size of buffer to write.
        size - total data of test file.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O error occored.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parameter is invalid.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the output stream.
        定義:
        close インタフェース {1} 内の {0} java.io.Closeable
        オーバーライド:
        close クラス {1} 内の {0} java.io.FilterOutputStream
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • deflate

        protected void deflate()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes next block of compressed data to the output stream.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • write

        public void write(byte[] b,
         int off,
         int len)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes an array of bytes to the compressed output stream.

        This method will block until all the bytes are written.

        オーバーライド:
        write クラス {1} 内の {0} java.io.FilterOutputStream
        パラメータ:
        b - the data to be written
        off - the start offset of the data
        len - the length of the data
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • write

        public void write(int b)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a byte to the compressed output stream.

        This method will block until the byte can be written.

        オーバーライド:
        write クラス {1} 内の {0} java.io.FilterOutputStream
        パラメータ:
        b - the byte to be written
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error has occurred

      • finish

        public final void finish()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Finish compression, as same function as GZIPOutputStream.
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if I/O error occured.
